name: @okta/okta.github.io
description: NPM dependencies for testing and building developer.okta.com

scripts.build-prod: npm run clean && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build --verbose && rsync -av ./dist/ ./
scripts.start: npm run clean && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll serve --incremental
scripts.stop: if-env CI=true && exit 0 || (pkill -f clean && kill $(lsof -t -i:4000; lsof -t -i:4444))
scripts.pretest: npm start & wait-on http://localhost:4000 && webdriver-manager update --gecko false

author: Joel Franusic <joel.franusic@okta.com>
